extendedInfo.description: WHEREâS MY VALENTINE FEATURES 12 EXCLUSIVE LOVE-THEMED LEVELS STARRING SWAMPY AND PERRY!Swampy and Perry need some love â are you up to the challenge?SWAMPYâS STORYSwampy is a little different than other alligators in the sewers and he loves to take showers! Cut through dirt and guide water to Swampyâs shower across six challenging levels but keep an eye out for algae, tricks and traps! PERRYâS STORYIn Perryâs levels, use water in all its different forms â ice, steam and liquid â to solve the puzzles and to help Agent P get to headquarters.  Even super-sleuths need help!FOR AN AD FREE EXPERIENCE AND EVEN MORE EXCLUSIVE LEVELS, UPGRADE TO THE FULL VERSIONS OF WHEREâS MY WATER AND WHEREâS MY PERRY TODAY!WHEREâS MY WATERâ¢	Now features over 250 water-filled levels â¢	3 brand new levels to play every week â for FREEâ¢	Use fans, water balloons, toxic water, switches, bombs, and algae to solve puzzlesâ¢	Meet Swampyâs friends including Cranky and the Mystery Duck WHEREâS MY PERRY - Over 100 spy-themed challenges and growing!The evil villain Dr. Doofenshmirtz has scattered all kinds of lasers across the sewers â youâll need to use them to change water to itâs different forms to help power Agent Pâs transportation tubes!â¢	Over 120 spy-themed levels featuring tons of 'Inatorsâ¢	Collect all of the hidden dossiers to unlock bonus levelsâ¢	Try the brand-new Dr. Doofenshmirtz levels featuring the brand new Minion-inator!Visit www.facebook.com/WheresMyWater for hints, tips, tricks and other classified materials!Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It is a really fun game it has easy and challengeing levels and I love how you can pick your own character

reviews.title: Sweet and amazing

reviews.title: Disney does it again
reviews.comment: I love \"where\'s my water?\" And \"where\'s perry?\" And v.day special edition is just as fun as the originals!
reviews.author: Katrina Herr

reviews.title: More free fun
reviews.comment: Free levels from the best scratchcard/physics hybrid series are always a treat. Loses a star due to relentlessly advertising the main games even if you already own them. Please sort this out, Disney! It can\'t be hard to fix!

reviews.title: Love this game!

reviews.title: Upset :(
reviews.comment: I love the where\'s my water games but the valentine edition won\'t open at all on my Samsung Stratosphere. All it does is foreclose. Please fix :) & thanks a bunch n advance.

reviews.title: Latency issue
reviews.comment: I have full version of water and it does not run like this. Very slow and delays on the swiping , sometimes doesnt do it at all or shows it in chunks . Thunderbolt

reviews.comment: This is a app for us pre-teens, or teens to play if we have nothing else to do, I think this app would speak to the younger croud.but I love the concept of this (creative).\tThis is an o kay app, I think it will be better for younger generation.

reviews.title: Lacking
reviews.comment: Lacking in levels on the free version (which does not motivate me to buy the full version); doesn\'t respond to touch commands promptly on my Samsung device like it did on Apple.

reviews.title: Fuh-Un
reviews.comment: Me and my son love this game. We work together and even though there are too few levels he will play them one hundred times over. Me on the other hand....MORE PLEASE
